ValidationRule.description: Checks status Draft and Created. This was changed on Nov 14,2019
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(HWS_RecordTypeCheck__c, ISCHANGED( CH_ReportedDate__c ) && HWS_SOO_Reference_Number__c!=null, ISCHANGED( CH_ReportedDate__c ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Draft') ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Created') ))
